== List of wikifarms ==

For a list of wikis in these wikifarms, [http://code.google.com/p/wikiteam/source/browse/#svn%2Ftrunk%2Flistsofwikis look here]. If you know about a wiki which is missing in the lists, please, leave a comment.

=== MediaWiki ===
  * [http://editthis.info EditThis.info] (online, pending archive)
  * elwiki.com (offline and lost)
  * [https://meta.orain.org Orain] (online, [https://archive.org/details/wikifarm-orain.org-20130824 archived])
  * [http://www.referata.com Referata] (Semantic MediaWiki) ([http://archive.org/details/referata.com-20111204 archived])
  * ScribbleWiki (offline and lost)
  * Sourceforge: subdomains and sourceforge.net/apps/mediawiki/`*` (online, pending archive)
  * [http://www.shoutwiki.com ShoutWiki] 400+ wikis (online, [http://www.archive.org/details/shoutwiki.com archived])
  * [http://tropicalwikis.com TropicalWikis] [http://www.tropicalwikis.com/wiki/Special:Farmer/list 100+ wikis] (online but reset?, pending move to Orain)
  * [http://www.wikia.com Wikia] 250,000+ wikis (online, [https://archive.org/details/wikia_dump_20121109 partial archive] [http://archive.org/details/wikia_dump_20121204 2])
  * [http://wiki-site.com Wiki-site.com] (online, pending archive)
  * [http://wikkii.com Wikkii] 3,000+ wikis (archived, pending upload)

=== Not MediaWiki ===
  * Wik.is (offline)
